thread.title: Here's How Close Harrison Ford Came To Landing On Top Of A Passenger Jet
thread.title_full: Here's How Close Harrison Ford Came To Landing On Top Of A Passenger Jet

author: Raphael Orlove
title: Here's How Close Harrison Ford Came To Landing On Top Of A Passenger Jet

organizations.name: harrison ford reportedly crashes plane on golf course harrison ford reportedly crashes plane on golf course harrison ford

text:
Go to permalink GIF 
Harrison Ford, carpenter, actor and plane man, was involved in a “potentially serious incident” last week when he landed on a taxiway instead of a runway at John Wayne Airport here in Orange County, flying right over a passenger jet. Now we have video to show how close he got. Harrison Ford Is Pretty Fucking Far From The Best Pilot In The Galaxy Harrison Ford Is Pretty Fucking Far From The Best Pilot In The Galaxy Harrison Ford Is Pretty Fucking Far From The Best… Roughly two years after he crashed a plane on a golf course, NBC is reporting that Harrison Ford… Read more Read more 
Only two years ago did Ford straight up crash into a golf course in one of his little yellow planes, then a vintage WWII trainer. This time Ford was in an Aviat Husky. Harrison Ford Reportedly Crashes Plane On Golf Course Harrison Ford Reportedly Crashes Plane On Golf Course Harrison Ford Reportedly Crashes Plane On Golf… Harrison Ford has reportedly crashed a vintage plane into a golf course. The 72-year-old actor… Read more Read more 
Ford asked the air traffic controller, “Was that airliner meant to be underneath me?” as NBC reported at the time. 
Hey man, flying is hard. Could Be Worse
